get.summary: INTERNAL Get all the subscribers that are subscriber to this company.

post.summary: INTERNAL In a pub/sub scenario, when the current server is the publisher, it creates subscription information for a company.

get.summary: INTERNAL Retrieves all the logistics objects for a given company

post.summary: INTERNAL Creates a snapshot (memento) of the data

get.summary: Retrieves the events of a given logistics object

post.summary: Creates events for a given logistics object
Request delegation of access to third party to a logistics object
Callback URL for receiving notifications from publishers

get.summary: Retrieves a company for a given companyId. If topic is sent, the endpoint returns the subscription information for that topic, informationthat is usually sent back to publishers.
Retrieves the TimeMap of a given logistics object
Retrieves the memento for a logistics object closest to a given date time
Retrieves a memento for a given mementoId
Retrieves the audit trail (history) of a given logistics object
Retrieves the Access Control List of a given logistics object
Retrieves data from another ONE Record Server
